channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overgrowth covering jerb reducng road width, 22nd October
item.description:
Kerb on fencing side
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranham Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes outside the wagon and horses car park entrance, 22nd October
item.description:
Where the surface outside the wagon and horses pub car park is badly deteriorated, there is a significant pothole on the RH side of the road, facing hucclecote road and a similar sized one on the LH side in the middle of the carriageway. They have been there for over 6 months and are getting worse. I have already damaged my car on one of them as they are hard to avoid due to the bad parking there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Notley Place, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole by No. 6 where old concrete road ends, 22nd October
item.description:
Where the old concrete under-surface ends adjacent to No 6, there is a large pothole on the RH side of the carriage way as you face the roundabout. It's in the dip in the tarmac about 5 yards from the drainage manhole in the road. It has been getting worse over the past 6 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Conway Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain has been blocked for well over a year. Now causes water to enter nearing properties and frequently splashes residents and property., 21st October

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Northfield Terrace, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: The tree in Caernarfon close has not been looked after and park of the branches has snapped off,, 21st October
item.description:
The tree in Caernarfon close next to parking spaces as you drive in on left hand side has not been looked after and large branches have snapped off, luckily no damage to residents cars but this could happen if someone parks under, currently parking there is being avoided but the tree is next to parking spaces which are needed. Could the tree be trimmed , it is on a pavement within the close. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Caernarvon Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low hanging brambles and hedges, 21st October
item.description:
There are low hanging brambles and hedges running along lobleys drive affecting walkers please can these be cut back asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The gully is too small and wrongly positioned for raineater to escape, 21st October
item.description:
Gully/drain outside 161 Hewlett rd has been a problem for the last 10 years. It causes flooding covering the centre of the road and every 2 years you have to return to resurface the broken up road. Please address the cause of the problem to save this constant waste of council funds in patching up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Beechurst Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
